original_text: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for any work?
korean_text: 불에 던질 땔감이 될 뿐이라 불이 그 두 끝을 사르고 그 가운데도 태웠으면 제조에 무슨 소용이 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel
the fire devoureth both the ends of it
and the midst of it is burned
Is it meet for any work?
